thread.title: One of the Very Best Hotels....Ever! (Including a passel of 5* beauties)
thread.title_full: One of the Very Best Hotels....Ever! (Including a passel of 5* beauties) - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ckeff
title: One of the Very Best Hotels....Ever! (Including a passel of 5* beauties)
text:
How does a hotel with one measly star possibly rank in the top 5% off all the hotels in Rome? Here's how:
--It hires, trains, and assumedly rewards the best employees
--It ensures that guests come first in every way possible
--It delights the senses with luxe spacious rooms offering en suite steam rooms and Jacuzzi tubs with clean contemporary lines, art, leather furniture and excellent beds
--It offers a complimentary breakfast an elevator ride away
--It has delinquent customers writing rave reviews nearly 3 years after the fact! (May, 2014)
Room Tip: Splurge, spoil yourselves and get one of the higher end rooms with "healthy" in the descri... See more room tips
